column5: Youâ€™ll love my place because of quiet and intimate urban neighborhood, close to all the fun. It is an ideal base for activities in the Hill Country, My place is good for families (with kids), big groups, and furry friends (pets). 20 min to NorthStar Mall 20 min to Natural Bridge Caverns 25 min to Six Flags Fiesta Texas 30 min to Riverwalk/Downtown 30 min to New Braunfels (river tubing, Gruene hall) 30 min to the Missions 35 min to Sea World 35 min to San Marcos Outlet Mall .
